4 stars for just one menu item, 3.5 stars overall for action, ambience, wifi & clean washrooms.   is it worth waiting for 30 min? nah, I eat this type of breakfast all the time, it's part of my job lol.   but seriously, when you're on vacation, who wants to wait for an hour? and heard ppl gave up after 35min or so.luckily, others waited in line while I window shopped this gorgeous dessert place a block away, more on that later, lets digress as usual.that submarine sanwich with avocado, and whatever that meat & incredible sauce: that I have never tasted anything like it.   great portion too.but the eggs benedicts, smoothies, pancake ricotta: good but not rolling your eyes.   awesome display of fruits though.got the very front bench seating facing the crowds, watching you eat, kinda hilarious if you strive for that attention.
